name: BearVault BV450 Bear Resistant Food Canister
description: Designed for four-day trips, the BV450 is easy to use: you don't need tools to open, it's transparent so you can see inside, and it has a full-access, rain-proof opening. The canister also comes with retention guides so it's easy to strap to your backpack.Super rugged transparent polycarbonate construction.7.2L capacity.Diameter is 22cm, height is 21.5cmCertification for black bears by the Sierra Interagency Black Bear Group (SIBBG) and grizzly bear certified by the Interagency Grizzly Bear Committee (IGBC).Some areas require specific bear caches. Check with local bear cache regulations.
